articles.title: Thousands at Scout camp move into hotels after S Korea heatwave - BBC
articles.description: Over 4,000 UK Scouts are withdrawing from a World Jamboree over extreme heat and worries about facilities.
articles.content:
UK Scouts are being moved to hotels in Seoul after an international event in South Korea was hit by extreme heat.
Hundreds have fallen ill at the outdoor World Scout Jamboree, which is attended by m… [+6648 chars]
